summary: A cozy player home with all the essentials.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=3]Welcome to Grohiiksil Manor: a small but cozy player home with everything a Dovahkiin needs.Â [/size][/font]
[font=Georgia]
[size=4][u]Features[/u]:[/size]
[/font][list][*][font=Georgia][size=3]An Enchanting corner - contains Arcane Enchanter and customized storage[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]An Alchemy corner - contains Alchemy Lab and customized storage[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]A Smithing area - contains Smelter, Tanning Rack, Anvil, Workbench and Grindstone with chests/strongboxes for storage[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]A Cooking Pot - barrels for food storage are on the opposite wall[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]4 Mannequins[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]5 Weapon Racks[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]5 Bookshelves (fits 220 books total)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]A bedroom area - contains a 2-person bed with a chest and strongbox for storage[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]Cheese[/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia]
[u][size=4]Location:[/size][/u]
[size=3]On the big lake West of Riften, slightly South-East of Heartwood Mill (North of Largashbur). There is a map marker for it and you should be able to fast travel to it right away.
[/size]
[size=4][u]Installation[/u]:[/size]
[size=3]Click on the "download with manager" button and use your preferred mod manager to install (I recommend [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url][size=3])[/size]

[size=4][u]Updates:[/u]
[list][*][size=4]v1.1 - Navmeshing added to entire house and increased the brightness of the lights in the lower levels of the house.[/size][/*]
[/list][/size]
[u][size=4]Compatibility:[/size][/u]
[size=3]This mod should be compatible with any other mod, unless the other mod modifies the same space in the world that this one does.

[/size][u][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/u]
[/font][list][*][font=Georgia][u][/u][size=3]Skyrim. This mod was made using only things from vanilla Skyrim so it doesn't require anything else.[/size]
[/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia]
[size=4][u]Known Issues:[/u][/size]
[/font][list][*][font=Georgia][size=3]The animations for the smelter and tanning rack are off - I don't know if I can fix this without making them normal size again so it may just be something we'll have to live with.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]You can't sit on the stone bench in the bathing area while in the water - Not sure if this is really fixable either but you can still sit on it from outside the water.[/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia]
[u][size=4]Notes:[/size][/u]
[/font][list][*][font=Georgia][size=3]This is my first house mod so please keep that in mind.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]Any comments, suggestions, or constructive criticisms are welcomed and appreciated.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]Please let me know any and all issues you have with this mod. I'll do my best to get them fixed as soon as possible.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]If anyone could send me a link to a tutorial on how to add fish to the water outside without them swimming away that would be awesome.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]If anyone creates a video showcasing this mod or reviewing it please send me a link![/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia]
[u][size=4]Thanks to:[/size][/u]
[/font][list][*][font=Georgia][size=3]Everyone who made the modding tutorials I watched/read (Gopher especially)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]Anyone who decides to give this mod a try (with an extra thanks to anyone who leaves me a comment)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]All the other modders on this site who make such awesome work and inspire me to create my own[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=3]Bethesda for creating such an amazing game[/size][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Georgia][size=3]
This mod has been cleaned with Tes5Edit.[/size][/font][font=Georgia]

[size=2]Last Updated: 12/20/2014[/size][/font]
author: InsanePinky
